displayName: Ensure CONTROL_MANAGEMENT_PACK_ACCESS is not concerning and not equal to diagnostic+tuning
rationale: A value of or 'DIAGNOSTIC+TUNING' for this parameter enables the usage of features related to the Oracle Diagnostic Pack and Oracle Tuning Pack.
error_message: CONTROL_MANAGEMENT_PACK_ACCESS is concerning and has a value of DIAGNOSTIC+TUNING
ruleNames: Ensure CONTROL_MANAGEMENT_PACK_ACCESS is not concerning and not equal to diagnostic+tuning
